Brand: KPS Essentials

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: *Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond Oil), *Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, *Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, *Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, *Theobroma Cacao (Cacao) Powder, *Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Powder, *Ro

ic) Root Powder, *Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Powder, *Myristica Fragrans (Nutmeg) Powder, *Proprietary Blend of Essential Oils.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
